name: project-timer
description: Track your coding time automatically with detailed language, project and file-level insights.

project-timer.statusBar.enabled.description: Whether the status bar timer is enabled.

project-timer.statusBar.displayPrecision.description: The precision the status bar will display. `auto` will automatically choose the precision based on the time.

project-timer.statusBar.displayProjectNa.description: Whether the project name should be displayed on the status bar.

project-timer.statusBar.displayToday.description: Whether today's time should be displayed on the status bar.

project-timer.timer.pauseWhenUnfocused.description: Whether the timer should pause when the VSCode window is unfocused.

project-timer.timer.unfocusedThreshold.description: Threshold (minutes) for unfocused pause. If the window is unfocused for longer than this threshold, the timer will pause.

project-timer.timer.pauseWhenIdle.description: Whether the timer should pause when user is idle.

project-timer.timer.idleThreshold.description: Idle time threshold (minutes). If the user is idle for longer than this threshold, the timer will pause.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.prerelease: npm run pretest && npm run test && npm run build
